name: 2.6 "Affairs of the Heart" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Carla say honey was?
questions.explanation:
bee barf.

	Diane said a customer referred to her as "honey". Carla said that made sense because honey was bee barf. The conversation started all because a guy called Carla "cutie".

questions.text: How much did Norm say he could drink and still stay "within his suds allowance"?
questions.explanation:
1 beer every 30 min.

	Norm was unemployed a long time. He also did not stay on his beer drinking schedule.

questions.text: What was the name of the guy who liked Carla?
questions.explanation:
Hank.

	Hank was played by Don Amendolia. He was born February 1, 1945 in New Jersey.

questions.text: Why did Carla talk to the man at first?
questions.correct: To find out what was wrong with him
options: To say she wasn't interested in him
To tell him she was already married
To find out if he liked children
questions.explanation:
To find out what was wrong with him.

	Carla believed that every man she liked or liked her had something wrong with him. However, she was unable to find anything wrong with Hank.

questions.text: What did Carla say had to be wrong with the man?
questions.explanation:
He was bad in bed.

	Carla said that Hank was perfect in every way. This in her eyes meant he had to be lousy in bed.

questions.text: Why did Carla say the man was a jerk?
options: because he was two timing her
questions.explanation:
because he was hiding something.

	Carla was convinced there was something wrong with Hank. She found it very difficult to trust any guy especially one that appeared to be a good guy.

questions.text: Where did Carla and the man go to have sex?
questions.explanation:
Diane's apartment.

	They were going to go to Carla's but they couldn't because of her kids. Then they were going to go to Hank's but he was staying with a friend because something was being done to his apartment. So Carla told Diane to give her the keys to her apartment. Diane told them to "burn the place" when they were finished using it.

questions.text: What medical problem did the man have?
questions.explanation:
bad heart.

	Hank could die if he had sex. He didn't want to tell Carla which upset Carla because she wouldn't be happy waking up to a dead man.

questions.text: Who went to check on the man?
questions.explanation:
Sam and Diane.

	Coach told them that Hank had a bad heart. He then said Carla and Hank should be fine as long as Hank didn't get too excited.

questions.text: What did Carla think about the medical problem of the man she was going to have sex with?
questions.correct: She didn't know what to think.
options: She thought he was cruel for not telling her.
She thought he was a jerk after all.
She thought he was a typical guy.
questions.explanation:
She didn't know what to think.

	Carla had mixed feelings about Hank. She was upset that he didn't mention his bad heart. At the same time she was really starting to like him.
